Headline: #3 King Drive, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, and #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 3, 147, 151 buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan near Michigan/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express,  and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 146 buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan, near Michigan/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Columbus, South Water, and Michigan due to, construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Columbus, South Water, and Michigan due to, construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Jefferson/Lake
ShortDescription: Northbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Jefferson, Randolph, Halsted, and Desplaines due to, construction near Jefferson/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Jefferson, Randolph, Halsted, and Desplaines due to, construction near Jefferson/Lake.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/28th
ShortDescription: SB 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 26th, Kostner, 31st and into terminal due to, street blockage near Pulaski/28th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 26th, Kostner, 31st and into terminal due to, street blockage near Pulaski/28th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near 87th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near 87th due to a stalled train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near 87th due to a stalled train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
